name: FlowForm Motion Suit
tagline: Smart motion suit for desk-bound athletes
description: FlowForm Motion Suit is a smart compression suit with approximately 10 motion sensors on the arms, legs, chest, and head. It provides real-time form feedback for yoga, light strength work, and easy running, helping desk-bound knowledge workers move with more control and confidence.
primaryUseCases: Yoga alignment feedback in small apartments
Light strength training with better form awareness
Easy park runs with gait and posture insights
targetCustomers: Mid-career knowledge workers with stiff backs
Beginner runners who cross-train with yoga
Young parents squeezing in efficient home workouts
environments: Clinic or research office with standing desk
